page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content:
{A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MRS J DAVIES }
I rose at 6.30 a.m.,washed and dressed,then downstairs,made a mug of coffee,let in cat,fed cat,budgie and hamster,cleaned and re_laid fire and tidied living room.Roused David and Sarah at 7.10,prepared their breakfast,washed up,made beds,tidied bedrooms and bathroom.Checked that all was ready for school and playgroup before we departed at 8.25.I went to the village hall to prepare playgroup ready for 9.30 to 11.30 session,after clearing up I arrived home at 12.00 p.m.,had lunch and did the ironing. At 1.30 into the garden to weed and dead_head flowers.Left home at 3.10 to meet Sarah and check flower arrangements in school.Home at 3.40, lit fire and prepared evening meal.
